name: Chernobyl Conspiracy
description:
Participation for the 42 Jam made with theogros.

The CIA sent you to a mission in Pripyat to sabotage the Chernobyl nuclear plant!

Your mission was a success, but you now have to escape from the underground base!

Because of a few problem we had during the jam, we couldn't fix some bugs, you might have to restart the game if problems appear.
